document.heading: Woolly Mammoth Theatre Tax Abatement Act of 2001

history.narrative: Law 14-128, the “Woolly Mammoth Theatre Tax Abatement Act of 2001”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-402, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 8, 2002, and February 5, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 25, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-289 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-128 became effective on May 2, 2002.
